name: Arkanoid Galaxy HD 2021
description:
Welcome to Arkanoid Galaxy HD 2021! Ready to conquer the Universe? A 70's classic game remade with an exotic space taste! Explore different galaxies with stunning views and exciting challenges! A classic breakout arkanoid game with a different planet to conquer in every level! These are the main features that this game offers :

· Adaptive High Quality HD Graphics

Select your desired quality level to match your mobile device's performance and thus ensure a smooth gameplay experience using the Graphics settings in the Options panel!

· Easy to play

Simply place your finger below the paddle, hold and drag in the direction you wish yo move! Easy, right?

· Multilanguage support

Available in 9 languages and more translations are coming soon!

Enjoy!
